Description: The identifier for this contract. It must be unique and cannot change within its Open Contracting Process (defined by a single ocid). See the identifier guidance for further details.
The award.id against which this contract is being issued.
The current status of the contract. Drawn from the contractStatus codelist
The start and end date for the contract. See Period
The total value of this contract. See Value
The goods, services, and any intangible outcomes in this contract. Note: If the items are the same as the award do not repeat. See Item section for further details.
The date the contract was signed. In the case of multiple signatures, the date of the last signature.
All documents and attachments related to the contract, including any notices. See Document section for further details.
Information related to the implementation of the contract in accordance with the obligations laid out therein. See Implementation
